item.description:
Wondering how to get a waiting list of tenants begging to get into your properties, have their rent deposited directly to your bank account, and have them take great care of the place, too?

Join us at Turning the Key where local investors Mike and Jim Jordan will be spilling the beans on how to rent to and manage section 8 tenants.

Jordan Properties, LLC has over 30 years of experience in providing affordable housing for low and middle income earners.

Of note, Mike and Jim will be discussing:
  • How to make apartments desirable for tenants with section 8 vouchers
  • How to find tenants with section 8 vouchers
  • The right way to do background checks on prospective tenants
  • How to submit paperwork to the housing authorities
  • How to manage the tenants
  • How to remove problem tenants
  • How to pass yearly inspections
  • How to systemize the entire process


Seating is Limited and pre-registration is HIGHLY recommended!

$30 at the Door • $15 for Pre-Registrations • $10 for Pre-Registered Members • FREE for TTK Pass Holders. Pre-Register Online <-- Here

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston
